content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe Congress’ oversight power and explain why the framers of the Constitution gave Congress this power. Explain how the actions taken by Congress could affect the operations of the IRS in the future. Describe how the scenario illustrates the bureaucracy’s role in policy making. Explain how that role could conflict with the agenda of another branch of government.
